interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Glass Nail File - JORLAI 2PC Nano Nail Shiner Nail Files Polisher Glass Nail Buffers Professional Crystal Manicure Tools Kit for Natural Nails
Review Date: 2020/09/08
Store: JORLAI
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 2.5 x 0.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '712322500167'}
Review Text: These are very cute and sparkly and come in their own case. I like that they’re nice and small and the thickness is great for shaping the sides of your nails. I found the buffing part slow going and it took quite a while to build up a shine but I’m happy with the end result. My nails took a real beating from gel so I’m giving them a break from all polish and this really helps build a lovely shine.
Review Title: Gives a good natural shine
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
[Weekly Point Cosmetic Rose edition mask sheet] - Facial skin care mask sheet 3solutions(Wriklecare, Brighten up, Moisture) in one (1Pack of 10pcs) Weekly Point Cosmetic {'Brand': 'Weekly Point Cosmetic', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisture,Skin', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.38 x 4.84 x 7.01 inches; 12.63 Ounces'} I’ve been using sheet masks for years. Long before they became something you could buy at your local pharmacy so I’m used to reading the adorable translations on the back (see photo)

That aside the mask is a little on the small side and I think I have an average sized face. It does stretch though and the benefit is that it doesn’t get in your hair. Lots of serum with this one, or mask juice as I like to call it
so at the end of the mask time you have enough to apply extra to your face a neck.

I left it for the full 20 minutes and my skin did feel soft and moisturised. I used it after a transatlantic flight and my skin really needed the hydration. Obviously you won’t see any miracles after one use but do make it part of your weekly or twice weekly routine for maximum effect.

Don’t be tempted to leave it on longer or sleep with it. All masks will just dry out and negate the benefits.

This is a nice addition to my sheet mask collection. Lovely and hydrating. Glass Nail File - JORLAI 2PC Nano Nail Shiner Nail Files Polisher Glass Nail Buffers Professional Crystal Manicure Tools Kit for Natural Nails JORLAI {'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 2.5 x 0.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '712322500167'} These are very cute and sparkly and come in their own case. I like that they’re nice and small and the thickness is great for shaping the sides of your nails. I found the buffing part slow going and it took quite a while to build up a shine but I’m happy with the end result. My nails took a real beating from gel so I’m giving them a break from all polish and this really helps build a lovely shine. Gives a good natural shine
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare Enthusiast:** The user maintains a strong interest in skin care, particularly with sheet masks, indicating a commitment to nourishing routines.
- **Hydration Focus:** Prioritizes moisture and hydration in their skincare, especially after travel, showcasing a need for restorative solutions.
- **Routine-Oriented:** Incorporates masks into a regular weekly or bi-weekly regimen for effective results, reflecting a consistent approach to skincare.
- **Quality Over Quantity:** Values gradual and sustainable results rather than quick fixes, demonstrating patience in their skincare journey.
- **Sensory Preferences:** Enjoys pleasant scents and appreciates products that enhance the sensory experience while caring for the skin.
- **User-Friendly Products:** Favors easy-to-use items that seamlessly integrate into their routine without causing inconvenience.
- **Value for Money:** Seeks products that deliver ample benefits, maximizing the effectiveness of each application.
- **Analytical Reviewer:** Engages in thoughtful feedback, analyzing product fit and performance while sharing user experiences.
- **Nail Care Interest:** Recently ventured into nail care, expressing a preference for tools that enhance the natural appearance of nails and serve practical needs, reflecting an expanded interest in personal grooming.

Overall, this user prioritizes effective, hydrating skincare, and has developed an organized routine, now extending their attention to nail care with an appreciation for products that offer understated excellence.
